attributes.additional_details:
This is a petition for a school citizenship campaign, were our group wants to leave the EU due to many reasons, such as the brussels and how we should have more independence, so to make our own laws because they make 75% of our laws and want to change this.

So please sign our petition becuase it would help alot.

Thank You
